brief_summary.textblock:
To compare the effect of two different agents  deksmedetomidine, remifentanil and placebo,
      agitation and recovery condition, on nasal septum operation.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of Deksmedetomidine and Remifentanil in Extubation Agitation

detailed_description.textblock:
Nasal septum operation cause agitation because of nasal package. This research aims
      determine which agent , deksmedetomidine  remifentanil or placebo, is more beneficial to the
      patient.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Adult patients

        Exclusion Criteria:
